Name: A Rush of Blood to the Head
description: A Rush of Blood to the Head is the second studio album by Coldplay, featuring the hit singles 'The Scientist' and 'Clocks'.

Name: Divide
description: Divide is Ed Sheeran's third studio album, including chart-topping singles like 'Shape of You' and 'Castle on the Hill'.
21 is the second studio album by Adele, featuring emotional ballads like 'Rolling in the Deep' and 'Someone Like You'.

Name: Abbey Road
description: Abbey Road is the eleventh studio album by The Beatles, widely regarded as one of the greatest albums in history.

Name: A Night at the Opera
description: A Night at the Opera is Queen's fourth studio album, featuring the iconic song 'Bohemian Rhapsody'.

Name: When We All Fall Asleep, Where Do We Go?
description: This is Billie Eilish's debut album, blending alternative pop with haunting vocals and dark themes.
1989 is Taylor Swift's fifth studio album, marking her full transition to pop music with hits like 'Shake It Off'.

Name: Doo-Wops & Hooligans
description: Doo-Wops & Hooligans is Bruno Mars' debut album, featuring the global smash 'Just the Way You Are'.

Name: Thriller
description: Thriller is Michael Jackson's sixth studio album, known for its groundbreaking music videos and iconic tracks like 'Billie Jean'.

Name: Evolve
description: Evolve is Imagine Dragons' third album, featuring hits like 'Believer' and 'Thunder'.
